page.title: 04Industry in Dunmow
page.content: There are two industrial estates in Dunmow. The largest is off Chelmsford Road, and the other is near Ongar Road. Both are away from the main shopping area and houses. Most of the industrial units are small businesses. Some of them are like shops and sell things such as car tyres, timber and 'do-it-yourself' goods. Other units incude boat and car repairs, engineering firms and tool makers. The largest single employer is Carr, Day and Martin who deal with household cleaning equipment such as furniture and shoe polish. Special mention must be made of the Dunmow Flitch Bacon Factory which was an important employer in the area. Unforunately this factory closed last year and resulted in a loss of many jobs.
